resources.string: Enable locking of phone with custom password

!status
Get phone\'s status

!location
Get phone\'s latest, else last known location

!wipe
Wipe external storage/SD card

!alarm (optional - int seconds| default - 10 seconds)
Sound the alarm for X seconds or default, 10 seconds

!message (message)
Show message on the screen

!unlock (password)
Unlock phone when lock with message

!lock (optional - String password | default - master password)
Lock phone with user-defined password in text, else locked using master password set during login.

!encrypt (or your personal encrypt command in Settings)
Encrypt files

!unlock (password)
Unlock phone when lock with message
